participant_1.background:
I've only been at my current job for a few months, but I'm already enjoying it.
i have three roommates.
i enjoy talking to strangers.

my masters degree is in italian literature.

participant_2.background:
I value my collection of Celtics memorabilia.
i love to read fantasy novels and poetry.
I prefer to eat alone at a quiet restaurant, where I can enjoy my meal and my thoughts.
I love celebrating Diwali with my family.
i like vintage furniture.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you! What are your hobbies?
I enjoy reading fantasy novels and poetry, and I also love to cook.
That's awesome! I enjoy reading fantasy novels too. What's your favorite book?
That's a tough question! I have so many favorites, but I think I'd have to say The Lord of the Rings.
That's a great book! I love the world that Tolkien created.
Me too! It's so immersive and detailed.
I have so many favorites, but I think I'd have to say "The Raven" by Edgar Allan Poe.
That's a great poem! I love the way it builds suspense and atmosphere.
Me too! It's so haunting and beautiful.
What do you like to cook?
I like to cook all sorts of things, but I'm especially good at making pasta dishes.
I love pasta! What's your favorite pasta dish to make?
I love making a simple spaghetti pomodoro. It's so easy to make, but it's always delicious.
That sounds delicious! I'll have to try it sometime.
You definitely should! It's one of my favorite dishes to make.
